title: floschl/pysamosa

Satellite altimetry is a space-borne remote sensing technique used for Earth observation.

title: ioos/Cloud-Sandbox
description: IOOS' Coastal Modeling Cloud Sandbox provides a framework for developing, modifying and running models in the cloud. The Sandbox supports not only the development of services and models, but also Cloud HPC to run and validate models.
